channel.title: Exporting maps question.
channel.description:
Hi! I've got a little problem.
I wanna do a map exporting from AG2 to BM. I dunno how can I put models and materials in Black Mesa folders to realize the mapping. The problem is Adrenaline Gamer 2 hasn't got .vpk files, cuz is a Source 2007 mod, and I dunno how can I do?
Please can you help me? :smiley:
Thanks

item.title: Exporting maps question.

item.description:
All. If I don’t have a guide or something similar I don’t know how to do this.

Read full topic
